SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.view.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class CLI extends Object implements View
This class handles the view part of the game, more specifically it handles the Command Line Interface (CLI). It contains methods needed to render elements of the game (such as the board or cards) and to communicate with the model and the controller. It implements the interface View, which itself defines crucial methods needed for the correct functioning of the CLI.

  • Constructor Details

    • CLI

      public CLI(Client client, boolean isLoaded)
      Constructor method for this class. cliController handles data-related game saved locally, more specifically: -board cards that can be picked up -cards on top of the deck -a local copy of the player table, bar the placedCard matrix which is retrieved from the server -global and board points counter -the nicknames of the players currently present in the match
      Parameters:
      isLoaded - : true if the game is loaded from a previous save, false otherwise.

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is called when the game starts. It clears the console and prints the game logo. It then calls the commandHandler method, which is responsible for handling the input from the user; this command is crucial to handle the correct flow of the game.
      Specified by:
      start in interface View

    • initView

      public void initView(String[] nicknames, Objectives[] globalObjectives, ResourceCard[] cardsOnHand, ResourceCard[] cardsOnTable)
      initializes view.
      Specified by:
      initView in interface View
      Parameters:
      nicknames - : array of nicknames of the players in the match.
      globalObjectives - : array of global objectives of the match.
      cardsOnHand - : array of initial cards in the hand of the player.
      cardsOnTable - : array of initial drawable cards present on the table.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Receives a message sent from the chat. If the chat is open, the message is displayed on the console; otherwise, it is saved in a buffer and eventually shown when the chat is open.
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      message - : object ChatMessage; it contains the body of the message as well as sender and receiver information and whether the message is private or not.

    • printPoints

      public void printPoints()

    • commandHandler

      public void commandHandler() throws IOException
      This method handles user's input & commands. The bulk of the game's logic is contained in this method. More methods needed to display important information (such as the leaderboard, the player's board, the cards in hand, the objectives, etc.) are called here when the user send correct commands, which can be displayed by typing "/help".
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setupPhase

      public void setupPhase(BufferedReader br) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the setup phase of the match: the player draws a starting card and two objectives, then chooses which ones to keep.
      Parameters:
      br - : BufferedReader; needed to take user's input.
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
